introduction: In 2025 we will again be holding our camp for a real mobility transition in Munich. With a varied program of workshops, lectures, art, music and much more.
food_and_drinks_description: All information on food at the camp
participate_description: We appreciate any support we can get. You are welcome to contact us and help organize or simply give us a hand with a donation.
program_description: A lot going on at the camp
program_guests_description: This year we have made a great effort to invite a wide range of guests in order to be able to present an interesting mix of discussions, lectures and entertainment.
program_workshops_description: Once again we have a wide range of workshops on offer. From practical skills to useful knowledge to political education, we have something for everyone.
program_participate_headline: Workshops and guests from the area
program_participate_description: You would also like to give a workshop or give a lecture. Get in touch with us.
program_music_description: We are pleased to be able to offer a diverse range of bands and artists at our camp. All different genres get their money's worth here.
awareness_description: We want to be a 'safeR' space. Here you can find out what that is and how.
code_of_conduct_description: How do we want to live together?
self_image_description: Everything about our views and how we see ourselves
press_notifications_description: Current press releases from the camp
glossar_description: Here we explain various terms that we use.
donation_widget_description: Organizing and hosting a camp costs money. Help us stay independent of large donors and be a camp for everyone.
donation_widget_read_more: Find out more about donations here
newsletter_widget_description: We'll send you updates and news by email
youtube_load_scripts: Load YouTube video. You can Third-party scripts and cookies are loaded.
description_404: Sorry, the page could not be found.
newsletter_signed_up: Thank you for signing up for the newsletter.
next_onboarding: Next Onboarding on the 13.05.25 . Join us!
